entry.title: Wednesday: Periods of light snow. High minus 10. POP 30%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud. 30 percent chance of light snow near noon. Wind southeast 20 km/h becoming light early this afternoon. High minus 10. Wind chill minus 24 this morning and minus 15 this afternoon. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 11:00 AM CST Wednesday 01 March 2023
